message: Constant name not following naming convention - Name 'superListenerField' must match pattern '^[A-Z][A-Z0-9]*(_[A-Z0-9]+)*$'.
Member name not following naming convention - Name 'mSuperScrollListener' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
Member name not following naming convention - Name 'mViewTreeObserver' must match pattern '^(([a-z]{2})|([x-z][A-Z]))[a-zA-Z0-9]*$'.
